attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people, this is not an understatement, would like to instill our thougts and values at a time before a crisis unveils, this unfortunately is this case.  No 1,change, whether that be held under a shadow of old school religion or not we would like the following views to be heard or considerated.

rejection.details: Please reword the title of your petition.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
